attributes.action: Cancel any Child Support payments in cases of unnecessary parental alienation
attributes.background:
The Child Maintainence Service continue to persue payments to parents who block their child from seeing a loving parent for no reason but spite. 

Children should never be used as pawns after the breakdown of a relationship and maybe stopping payments will discourage this from happening.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining exactly what you mean by 'unnecessary parental alienation'.
